author: colizz
body:
#### PR description:
 
Fix the regex to match the LHE tags in the `mergeLHE.py` script.

Now we are capable to match the tag if it has leading spaces. The issue is discussed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/34531#issuecomment-892005200

#### PR validation:

Validation done based on https://github.com/colizz/mergelhe_validate indicated by `mergeLHE.py -h` .

A backport to 10_6_X is also needed.
title: Fix the mergeLHE.py script
